Based on the user's message, it seems that they are interested in crime movies. Here are two highly rated crime movies that you might enjoy: 

1. "The Godfather" (1972): Directed by Francis Ford Coppola, this classic gangster movie tells the story of the Corleone family, who run powerful Mafia clans in New York City. With a star-studded cast featuring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, and Robert Duvall, "The Godfather" is widely regarded as one of the greatest movies ever made.

2. "Goodfellas" (1990): Directed by Martin Scorsese, this highly acclaimed crime movie tells the story of Henry Hill, a small-time Italian-American criminal who rises to power and falls due to his greed and ambition. With an all-star cast featuring Ray Liotta, Robert De Niro, Joe Pesci, and Lyle Gagnon, "Goodfellas" is widely regarded as one of the greatest movies ever made.
